message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I think this is a great deal considering the value it brings to the table.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $10000 is your maximum budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11500. This is a fair compromise considering the value the product brings to the table.
